184b7('bum): spyod na chags pa'o/ / dbang po rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i
185a1('bum): bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ / bsam gtan rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// tshad pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam
185a2('bum): par thar pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod na chags pa'o// mngon par
185a3('bum): shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na chags
185a4('bum): pa'o/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// snying rje chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs
185a5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o// lam
185a6('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
185a7('bum): rnams kyi chags pa pa gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la gzugs zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do/ / tshor ba la
185b1('bum): tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do/ / 'du shes la 'du shes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// 'du byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du shes pa do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// 'das pa'i
185b2('bum): chos rnams la 'das pa'i tshes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do/ / ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// de ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// tshe dang ldan
185b3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// 'di la sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe 'am/
185b4('bum): bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo // tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo// bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsam mo// brtson 'grus 'di
185b5('bum): lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go/ bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni shes rab cig bsgom mo/ shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag
185b6('bum): gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do/ / bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do// bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par chud par bya'o// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
185b7('bum): bya'o/ / bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smyin par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
186a1('bum): mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
186a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
186a3('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir cing rgyu ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag
186a4('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa pa dag go/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor
186a5('bum): rnam grangs gang gis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka
186a6('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du
186a7('bum): shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
186b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes
186b2('bum): pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes
186b3('bum): pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes
186b4('bum): pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub
186b5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
186b6('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa
186b7('bum): dang / smon pa med par 'du shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
187a1('bum): 'jigs pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byams pa chen por 'du shes pa dang / snying rje chen por 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
187a2('bum): brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas bla na pa yang
187a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/
187a4('bum): chags pa pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni kau shi ka gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin
187a5('bum): yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
187a6('bum): bar nus so/ / sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// gzugs kyi rang bzhin
187a7('bum): yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / sgra'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dri'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ro'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// reg gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// chos
187b1('bum): kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
187b2('bum): nus so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gi 'dus te reg
187b3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus
187b4('bum): so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rna
187b5('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
187b6('bum): nus so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
187b7('bum): nus so/ / chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su
188a1('bum): bsngo bar nus so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//
188a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//
188a3('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su
188a4('bum): bsngo bar nus so/ / rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
188a5('bum): phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
188a6('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// stong pa nyid
188a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
188b1('bum): bar nus so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
188b2('bum): nus so/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rang gi
188b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
188b4('bum): kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
188b5('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//
188b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//
188b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// tshad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam
189a1('bum): par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
189a2('bum): pa dang / smon pa pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang
189a3('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
189a4('bum): yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus
189a5('bum): so/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dgra bcom
189a6('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so/ / rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs
189a7('bum): su bsngo bar nus so/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan zhig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed
189b1('bum): dam/ yang dag par dga' bar bya na/ yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang
189b2('bum): ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
189b3('bum): do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag
189b4('bum): ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / shes
189b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang /
189b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong
189b7('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
190a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
190a2('bum): 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
190a3('bum): la sbyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
190a4('bum): bdag ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong
190a5('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
190a6('bum): 'gyur ba dang / pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod
190a7('bum): do/ / zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
190b1('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / yang
190b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par
190b3('bum): rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur
190b4('bum): ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam
190b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan
190b6('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshad pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs
190b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad
191a1('bum): la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
191a2('bum): 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
191a3('bum): 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar
191a4('bum): rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni de
191a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par
191a6('bum): rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen
191a7('bum): po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par
191b1('bum): rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan cig
191b2('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod
191b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
191b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
191b5('bum): 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par bskul bar bya/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya/ yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na pa yang dag par
191b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ / yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang dag par bstan pa de dang yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag
191b7('bum): par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/ rma 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas
192a1('bum): kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// // shes rab kyi
192a2('bum): pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so// zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192a3('bum): rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so/ / rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par byas/ de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
192a4('bum): de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192a5('bum): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o// gang yang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang
192a6('bum): d a ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan
192a7('bum): mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang de ma
192b1('bum): yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o//
192b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
192b3('bum): zab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
192b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs
192b5('bum): ma rgyas pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no//
192b6('bum): gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas
192b7('bum): pa/ shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes
193a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos ma rtogs rnam par ma shes/ mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis khyab pa'o//
193a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// 'du shes kyis ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma
193a3('bum): shes so/ / gis ma shes so// rna bas ma shes so// snas ma shes so// lces ma shes so// lus kyis ma shes so// yid kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis ma shes so// sgras ma shes so// dris ma shes so// ros
193a4('bum): ma shes so/ / reg gis ma shes so// chos kyis ma shes so// gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so//
193a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg
193a6('bum): pas ma shes so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// sna'i
193a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// sa'i
193b1('bum): khams kyis ma shes so/ / chu'i khams kyis ma shes so// khams kyis ma shes so// rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so// nam mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so// ma rig
193b2('bum): pas ma shes so/ / 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma shes so// dang gzugs kyis ma shes so// skye mched drug gis ma shes so// reg pas ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// sred pas ma shes so//
193b3('bum): len pas ma shes so// srid pas ma shes so// skye bas ma shes so// rga shis ma shes so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so//
193b4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid
193b5('bum): kyis ma shes so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so//
193b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma
193b7('bum): shes so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
194a1('bum): ma shes so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so// dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so// stobs rnams
194a2('bum): kyis ma shes so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so// tshad pa rnams kyis
194a3('bum): ma shes so/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis ma shes so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
194a4('bum): ma pa dang / smon pa pas ma shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so//
194a5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so// byams pa chen pos ma shes so// snying rje chen pos ma shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis ma shes so// rgyun tu zhugs
194a6('bum): pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang byang chub kyis ma shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes
194a7('bum): so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu bdun no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
194b1('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs
194b2('bum): pa dang / tshor ba pa dang / 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa pa dang / pa dang / rna ba pa dang / sna pa dang / lce pa dang /
194b3('bum): lus pa dang / yid pa dang / gzugs pa dang / sgra pa dang / dri pa dang / ro pa dang / reg pa dang / chos pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa
194b4('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa
194b5('bum): dang / gi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / yid
194b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang /
194b7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / sa'i khams pa dang / chu'i
195a1('bum): khams pa dang / khams pa dang / rlung gi khams pa dang / nam mkha'i khams pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams pa dang / ma rig pa
195a2('bum): pa dang / 'du byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa pa dang / dang gzugs pa dang / skye mched drug pa dang / reg pa pa dang / tshor ba pa dang / sred pa pa dang /
195a3('bum): len pa pa dang / srid pa pa dang / skye ba pa dang / rga shi pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
195a4('bum): phyin pa pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / nang stong pa nyid pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid
195a5('bum): pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa dang / 'dus ma
195a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa dang / chos
195a7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / pa stong pa nyid pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / dngos po
195b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / dren pa nye bar gzhag pa pa dang / yang dag par spong ba pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa dang / dbang po pa dang / stobs pa dang / byang chub
195b2('bum): kyi yan lag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa dang / bsam gtan pa dang / tshad pa pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
195b3('bum): pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa pa dang / mngon par shes
195b4('bum): pa pa dang / ting nge 'dzin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa dang / 'jigs pa pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pa dang / byams pa
195b5('bum): chen po pa dang / snying rje chen po pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu pa dang / phyir 'ong
195b6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid pa dang / rang byang chub pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
195b7('bum): 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
196a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
196a2('bum): te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs
196a3('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par
196a4('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs do/ / gal te tshor ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor brtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am
196a5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar
196a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba do// gal
196a7('bum): te 'du shes la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
196b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
196b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag ba 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du shes do// gal te 'du byed la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
196b3('bum): pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed pa de zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
196b4('bum): te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
196b5('bum): rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed do// gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
196b6('bum): gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
196b7('bum): te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
197a1('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa do// gal te la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
197a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bdag
197a3('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am
197a4('bum): bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i do// gal te rna ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya
197a5('bum): bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes
197a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam/
197a7('bum): bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba do// gal te sna la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
197b1('bum): la spyod do/ / gal te sna bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna sdug
197b2('bum): ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
197b3('bum): sna do/ / gal te lce la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod
197b4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lce bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
197b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce do// gal te lus la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
197b6('bum): gal te lus rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus bdag ces bya ba 'am
197b7('bum): bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lus sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am
198a1('bum): sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus do// gal te yid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid rtag ces bya ba
198a2('bum): 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod
198a3('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
198a4('bum): gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid do/ / gal te gzugs la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
198a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
198a6('bum): do/ / gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am
198a7('bum): sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs do/ gal te sgra la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
198b1('bum): te sgra bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sgra bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra sdug ces bya ba 'am
198b2('bum): sdug ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra
198b3('bum): do/ / gal te dri la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na
198b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te dri bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/
198b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri do// gal te rol spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
198b6('bum): ro rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te ro bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro bdag ces bya ba'am bdag
198b7('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te ro sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa'am bde ba 'am sdug
199a1('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ro do// gal te reg la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag
199a2('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te reg bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg bdag ces bya ba'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na/
199a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
199a4('bum): gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i reg do// gal te chos la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te chos bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
199a6('bum): gal te chos sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am
199a7('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos do/ / gal te gi rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes
199b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/
199b3('bum): bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gi rnam par shes pa do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag
199b4('bum): ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
199b5('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
199b6('bum): rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha
200a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am
200a2('bum): sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i rnam
200a3('bum): par shes pa do/ / gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
200a4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
200a5('bum): do/ / gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam/ bdag
200a6('bum): pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i rnam par shes pa do/ / gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces
200a7('bum): bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'di zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces
200b1('bum): bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am
200b2('bum): rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
200b3('bum): gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
200b4('bum): la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha
200b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal pa 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa do// gal te gi
200b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya
200b7('bum): ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg
201a1('bum): pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/
201a2('bum): sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gi 'dus te reg pa do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar
201a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
201a4('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag
201a5('bum): pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
201a6('bum): gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
201a7('bum): gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
201b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod na shes rab
201b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes
201b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na
201b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa do//
201b5('bum): gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
201b6('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi
201b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am
202a1('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa do/ / gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya
202a2('bum): bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
202a3('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa
202a4('bum): 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa do/ / gal te gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
202a5('bum): do/ / gal te gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
202a6('bum): zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus
202a7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/
202b1('bum): sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
202b2('bum): byung ba'i tshor brtag ces bya ba'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
202b3('bum): pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/
202b4('bum): sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna
202b5('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba do/ / gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/
202b6('bum): rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i
202b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar
203a1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am ma rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa'am ma sdug par
203a2('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba do/ / gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor

203a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug

203b7('bum): lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba do/ / gal te sa'i khams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
204a1('bum): spyod do/ / gal te sa'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod
204a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba

204a4('bum): bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag
204a5('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te chu'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde

204a7('bum): ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te khams bdag ces bya

204b4('bum): gi khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

204b6('bum): la spyod do/ / gal te nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha
204b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes
205a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nam
205a2('bum): mkha'i khams do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
205a3('bum): spyod do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar skyod na/
205a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde
205a5('bum): ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa'i khams do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu
205a6('bum): drug pa/ / gal te ma rig pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa bde zhes
205a7('bum): bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa sdug ces
205b1('bum): bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur
205b2('bum): ba de lta bu'i ma rig pa do/ / gal te 'du byed la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed

205b7('bum): do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
206a1('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa do// gal te dang gzugs la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dang gzugs rtag
206a2('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dang gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dang gzugs bdag

206a4('bum): rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dang gzugs do// gal te skye mched drug la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
206a5('bum): te skye mched drug rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug zhe zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye

206b4('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab
206b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/
206b6('bum): bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba do// gal te sred pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi
206b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sred pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
207a1('bum): pa la spyod do/ / gal te sred pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/
207a2('bum): bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sred pa do// gal te len pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab
207a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te len pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te len pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/
207a5('bum): bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i len pa do// gal te srid pa la spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab
207a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te srid pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te srid pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
207b1('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i srid pa do/ gal te skye ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
207b2('bum): gal te skye ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba sdug
207b3('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta
207b4('bum): bu'i skye ba do/ / gal te rga shi la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
207b5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rga shi bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod
207b6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rga shi do// gal te sbyin pa'i
207b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes
208a1('bum): bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
208a2('bum): spyod do/ / gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam
208a3('bum): bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
208a4('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal
208a5('bum): te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha
208a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do//
208a7('bum): gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha
208b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
208b2('bum): gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
208b3('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya
208b4('bum): ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus
208b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
208b6('bum): spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do// gal te bsam
208b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha
209a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes
209a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am

209a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
209a5('bum): spyod do/ / gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes
209a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do//
209a7('bum): gal te nang stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/

209b5('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am
209b6('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi stong pa nyid do/ / gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

210a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde

210a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

210a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya

210b1('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug pa
210b2('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chen po stong pa nyid do/ / gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

210b6('bum): nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
210b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211a1('bum): la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid
211a2('bum): do/ / gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
