211a5('bum): 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
211a6('bum): do/ / gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya

211b1('bum): stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/

211b3('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/

211b5('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thog ma
211b6('bum): dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do/ / gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
211b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya
212a1('bum): bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

212a4('bum): bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba
212a5('bum): 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur
212a6('bum): ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ / gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes
212a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/
212b1('bum): bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa
212b2('bum): 'am rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab
212b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
212b4('bum): zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong
212b5('bum): pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am
212b6('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ / gal te pa stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya
212b7('bum): bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te pa stong pa nyid
213a1('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
213a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i pa stong pa nyid do// gal te dngos
213a3('bum): po pa stong pa nyid la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa stong pa
213a4('bum): nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
213a5('bum): gal te dngos po pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
213a6('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po pa stong pa nyid do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag
213a7('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba
213b1('bum): 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am
213b2('bum): rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
213b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
213b4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po
213b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag
213b6('bum): pa'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
213b7('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
214a1('bum): te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug
214a2('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran
214a3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa do/ / gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
214a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces
214a5('bum): bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag
214a6('bum): pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yang dag par spong ba do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214a7('bum): pa la spyod do/ / gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod
214b1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/
214b2('bum): sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
214b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa do/ / gal te dbang po rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
214b4('bum): te dbang po rnams pa de zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
214b5('bum): do/ / gal te dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
214b6('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang po do// gal te stobs rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes
214b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te stobs rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar
215a1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am
215a2('bum): rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i stobs do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215a3('bum): la spyod do/ / gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
215a4('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces
215a5('bum): bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub
215a6('bum): kyi yan lag do/ / gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes
215a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
215b1('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar skyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
215b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden
215b3('bum): pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
215b4('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

215b6('bum): bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa do// gal te bsam gtan rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba
215b7('bum): 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams
216a1('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
216a2('bum): spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan do// gal te tshad pa rnams la
216a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te tshad pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
216a4('bum): zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te tshad pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad pa rnams sdug ces bya
216a5('bum): ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug
216a6('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshad pa do/ / gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/
216a7('bum): rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
216b1('bum): gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/
216b2('bum): sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de
216b3('bum): lta bu'i gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa do/ / gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes
216b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag
216b5('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/
216b6('bum): rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad do// gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
216b7('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar kyis gnas
217a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bya ba 'am/
217a2('bum): bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
217a3('bum): gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i
217a4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya
217a5('bum): bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
217a6('bum): gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
217a7('bum): ma pa dang / smon pa pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam
217b1('bum): bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
217b2('bum): spyod do/ / gal te mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab
217b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug
217b4('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
217b5('bum): mngon par shes pa do/ / gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
217b6('bum): gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
217b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug
218a1('bum): bsngal pa 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
218a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

218a4('bum): spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo do// gal te de bzhin gshegs
218a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin
218a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na
218a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa
218b1('bum): 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs do// gal te 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
218b2('bum): pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes
218b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar
218b4('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'jigs pa
218b5('bum): do/ / gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
218b6('bum): spyod do/ / gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag
218b7('bum): ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
219a1('bum): rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par rig pa do// gal te byams pa chen po la spyod
219a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
219a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar
219a4('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byams pa
219a5('bum): chen po do/ / gal te snying rje chen po la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po bde
219a6('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po
219a7('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug
219b1('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po do/ / gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar
219b2('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
219b3('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
219b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa do// gal te thams cad shes pa
219b5('bum): nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/
219b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid
219b7('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am
220a1('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thams cad shes pa nyid do/ / gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba
220a2('bum): 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes
220a3('bum): pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i
220a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
220a5('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba
220a6('bum): 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
220a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
220b1('bum): gam/ bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa// rang 'byor
220b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
220b3('bum): gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na
220b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes yongs su
220b5('bum): ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes
220b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang
220b7('bum): yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i
221a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yongs
221a2('bum): su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes
221a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa
221a4('bum): de rna ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sna yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna yongs su
221a5('bum): ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lce yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
221a6('bum): la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su
221a7('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
221b1('bum): spyod do/ / gal te yid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar
221b2('bum): yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs
221b3('bum): su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sgra yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
221b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod
221b5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro yongs su ma rdzogs
221b6('bum): pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ro ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
221b7('bum): la spyod do/ / gal te reg yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de reg ma yin no zhes
222a1('bum): bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te chos yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so shes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
222a2('bum): chos yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar
222a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang
222a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar
222a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi
222a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma
222b1('bum): rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes
222b2('bum): bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab
222b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma
222b4('bum): rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes
222b5('bum): bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab
222b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa
222b7('bum): dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod
223a1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/
223a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs
223a3('bum): su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs
223a4('bum): so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na
223a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma
223a6('bum): rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang
223a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gi 'dus te
223b1('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/
223b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar
223b3('bum): yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so// zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
223b4('bum): zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
223b5('bum): gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs
223b6('bum): pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs
223b7('bum): pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi
224a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su
224a2('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
224a3('bum): bam yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i
224a4('bum): khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / yongs
224a5('bum): su rdzogs so/ / zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes
224a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs
224a7('bum): su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
224b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlung gi khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te

230a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i
230a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin no zhes bya
230a4('bum): ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
230a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su
230a6('bum): ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no
230a7('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
230b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs
230b2('bum): su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de de bzhin
230b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
230b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
230b5('bum): te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs
230b6('bum): su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar
230b7('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
231a1('bum): la spyod do/ / gal te snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa
231a2('bum): gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes
231a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na shes rab kyi
231a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su
231a5('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes
231a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
231a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
231b1('bum): nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs
231b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
231b3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang /
231b4('bum): ma chags pa legs par bstan to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
231b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
231b6('bum): gal te 'du shes chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi
231b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
232a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
232a2('bum): bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

232a6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dri chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

232b2('bum): te gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar

232b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi rnam par shes
232b5('bum): pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab
232b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
232b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am
233a1('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes
233a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

233a4('bum): ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
233a5('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/

233b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chu'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
233b3('bum): khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rlung gi khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha
233b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nam mkha'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

234b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi

235a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi

235b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi
235b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
235b3('bum): nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes
235b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha
235b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnams
235b6('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
235b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
236a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
236a2('bum): tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am ma chags

236a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
236a6('bum): te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo
236a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags
236b1('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

239b7('bum): bar 'du shes pa do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ bstan kyang 'phel/ ma bstan kyang 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom
240a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ bstan kyang 'phel ma bstan kyang
240a2('bum): 'phel lo/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa 'am ma lags pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa
240a3('bum): brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa do/ / nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa do// nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba do// nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
240a4('bum): bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba do/ / nyes pa brjod kyang 'grib pa do// legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba do// nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos
240a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang g.yeng
240a6('bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub
240a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so//

240b7('bum): pa'i khams ma mchis so/ / nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// dang gzugs ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// tshor
241a1('bum): ba ma mchis so/ / sred pa ma mchis so// len pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma mchis so// skye ba ma mchis so// rga shi ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi

241a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma
241a5('bum): mchis so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//
241a6('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so// dbang po rnams ma mchis so//
241a7('bum): stobs rnams ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so// tshad pa
241b1('bum): rnams ma mchis so/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
241b2('bum): ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so//
241b3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis so// snying rje chen po ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni
241b4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so// rang byang chub ma mchis so// bla na pa yang dag par
241b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di
241b6('bum): 'tshal ba de dag ni/ phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can
241b7('bum): rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing / yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/
242a1('bum): go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdegs par 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
242a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
242a3('bum): po gang sems can rnams kyi don du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos
242a4('bum): rnams kyi slad du/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyis khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
242a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam 'bras kyi shing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du
242a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa
242a7('bum): yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang ba gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs
242b1('bum): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam til gyi zhing bzhin
242b2('bum): du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su
242b3('bum): mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang bar gda' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bdag 'di
242b4('bum): skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags
242b5('bum): zhes mchi'o/ / de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po yang yod/
242b6('bum): rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ dgra bcom
242b7('bum): pa nyid kyang yod/ / rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba yang yod/ dgra bcom pa yang yod/ rang sangs
243a1('bum): rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod
243a2('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab
243a3('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
243a4('bum): la bslab par sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
243a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bag bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
243a6('bum): bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras
243a7('bum): pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan
243b1('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ de la ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams
243b2('bum): kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'
243b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub
243b4('bum): cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / yor dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab
243b5('bum): par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni nus so// smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab
243b6('bum): par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab
243b7('bum): par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni nus so// smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab
244a1('bum): par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam
244a2('bum): gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni nus so// smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
244a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
244a4('bum): smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta
244a5('bum): bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/
244a6('bum): lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed/
244a7('bum): smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag
244b1('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed// yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed/
244b2('bum): dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed// sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom
244b3('bum): sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed pa yin// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
244b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems

245a1('bum): la rlom sems su byed do/ / de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed// dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems

247a7('bum): gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
247b1('bum): byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su
247b2('bum): byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag
247b3('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri
247b4('bum): za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang
247b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna rlom sems su byed/ snas rlom sems su byed/ sna bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sna la rlom sems su byed na/
247b6('bum): de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su
247b7('bum): byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig
248a1('bum): rgyu la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do//

253a7('bum): su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do//
253b1('bum): de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom
253b2('bum): sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes
253b3('bum): pa rlom sems su byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pas rlom sems su byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam
253b4('bum): gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
253b5('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su
253b6('bum): byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor
253b7('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
254a1('bum): dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do//
254a2('bum): kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag
254a3('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su
254a4('bum): byed do/ / de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/
254a5('bum): smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems
254a6('bum): su byed do/ / de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/
254a7('bum): dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa
254b1('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su byed/
254b2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su byed na// de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/
254b3('bum): lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do//
254b4('bum): de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/
254b5('bum): sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom
254b6('bum): sems su byed do/ / de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom
254b7('bum): sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
255a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gi 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su byed/ gi 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su byed/ gi 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ gi 'dus te reg pa la rlom
255a2('bum): sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems
255a3('bum): su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems
