255a6('bum): rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi
255a7('bum): ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom
255b1('bum): sems su byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su

255b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su byed
255b7('bum): na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma
256a1('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems

256a5('bum): shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes
256a6('bum): rlom sems su byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do//

256b4('bum): mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi
256b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su byed na// de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
256b6('bum): lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus
256b7('bum): rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
257a1('bum): byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do//

257a3('bum): pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus
257a4('bum): te reg pa rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su byed na// de lam rlom sems su
257a5('bum): byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
257a6('bum): byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom
257a7('bum): sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor
257b1('bum): la rlom sems su byed do/ / de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul

257b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su byed/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
257b4('bum): byed/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom
257b5('bum): sems su byed do/ / de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do/ de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems
257b6('bum): su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la
257b7('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su
258a1('bum): byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom

258a3('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
258a4('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems
258a5('bum): su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes
258a6('bum): rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do//
258a7('bum): de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyir rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer
258b1('bum): gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems

258b3('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/
258b4('bum): lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
258b5('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra
258b6('bum): brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom
258b7('bum): sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la
259a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang
259a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ lce'i 'dus
259a3('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na// de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi
259a4('bum): zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom
259a5('bum): sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi
259a6('bum): zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do//
259a7('bum): de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul
259b1('bum): pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi
259b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
259b3('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/
259b4('bum): sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
259b5('bum): smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su
259b6('bum): byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i
259b7('bum): grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom
260a1('bum): sems su byed do/ / kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi 'dus
260a2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na// de lam rlom sems
260a3('bum): su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom
260a4('bum): sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom
260a5('bum): sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor
260a6('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i
260a7('bum): grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems
260b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sa'i khams rlom sems su byed/ sa'i khams kyis rlom sems su byed/ sa'i khams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sa'i khams la rlom sems
260b2('bum): su byed do/ / de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems

260b7('bum): kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chu'i khams rlom sems su byed/ chu'i khams kyis rlom sems su byed/ chu'i khams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
261a1('bum): byed/ chu'i khams la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do//

261b6('bum): khams rlom sems su byed/ rlung gi khams kyis rlom sems su byed/ rlung gi khams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ rlung gi khams la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom
261b7('bum): sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la
262a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan

262b5('bum): sems su byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag
262b6('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig

263a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma rig pa rlom sems su byed/ ma rig pas rlom sems su byed/ ma rig pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ ma rig pa la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis
263a5('bum): rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom

264a1('bum): grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do//

264b6('bum): de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul
264b7('bum): pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye mched drug rlom sems
265a1('bum): su byed/ skye mched drug gis rlom sems su byed/ skye mched drug bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ skye mched drug la rlom sems su byed na// de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam
265a2('bum): gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
265a3('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra
265a4('bum): brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems
265a5('bum): su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed
265a6('bum): do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
265a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ reg pa rlom sems su byed/ reg pas rlom sems su byed/ reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ reg pa la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/
265b1('bum): lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
265b2('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byad/ sgra
265b3('bum): brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom
265b4('bum): sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la
265b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub
265b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba rlom sems su byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na/
265b7('bum): de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/
266a1('bum): sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu
266a2('bum): la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su
266a3('bum): byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/

268b1('bum): sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
268b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems

269b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi

270b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/

271a2('bum): de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu
271a3('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su
271a4('bum): byed do/ / de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/
271a5('bum): dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul
271a6('bum): pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/
271a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ nang stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam
271b1('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de
271b2('bum): smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/
271b3('bum): sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la
271b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa
271b5('bum): rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
271b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ phyi stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su
271b7('bum): byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems
272a1('bum): su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do//
272a2('bum): de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/

272a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su

275a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ mtha'
275a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes

275b1('bum): dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de

276a1('bum): stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom

276a6('bum): byed do/ / kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ rang bzhin stong pa
276a7('bum): nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems
276b1('bum): su byed do/ / de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/

276b4('bum): za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi
276b5('bum): zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ chos
276b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su
276b7('bum): byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed
277a1('bum): do/ / de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis
277a2('bum): rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
277a3('bum): byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su
277a4('bum): byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
277a5('bum): rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ rang gi
277a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom
277a7('bum): sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes
277b1('bum): rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do//

282b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rlom sems su byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis rlom sems su byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rlom sems su byed na/
282b6('bum): de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma
282b7('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do//
283a1('bum): de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor
283a2('bum): gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag
283a3('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed
283a4('bum): do/ / kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan rnams
283a5('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan rnams la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems
283a6('bum): su byed do/ / de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su

287b1('bum): rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rlom sems su byed/
287b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rlom sems su byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/

287b7('bum): za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub

288a7('bum): pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
288b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rlom sems su byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis rlom sems su byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems
288b2('bum): su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom
288b3('bum): sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig
288b4('bum): rgyu la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su
288b5('bum): byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/
288b6('bum): dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul
288b7('bum): pa la rlom sems su byed do/ / kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po rlom sems su byed/ byams pa chen pos rlom sems su byed/ byams
289a1('bum): pa chen po bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ byams pa chen po la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom
289a2('bum): sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom
289a3('bum): sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra
289a4('bum): brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la
289a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul
289a6('bum): pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
289a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po rlom sems su byed/ snying rje chen pos rlom sems su byed/ snying rje chen po bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ snying rje chen po la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom
289b1('bum): sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi
289b2('bum): zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan
289b3('bum): rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/
289b4('bum): yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
289b5('bum): byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka
289b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rlom sems su byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis rlom sems su
289b7('bum): byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su
290a1('bum): byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/
290a2('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/
290a3('bum): sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi
290a4('bum): zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer
290a5('bum): la rlom sems su byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems
290a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
290a7('bum): byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de
290b1('bum): sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig
290b2('bum): rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems
290b3('bum): su byed do/ / de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/
290b4('bum): dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul
290b5('bum): pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rlom sems
290b6('bum): su byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/
290b7('bum): lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom
291a1('bum): sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su

291a3('bum): gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer
291a4('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su
291a5('bum): byed do/ / kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su
291a6('bum): byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag
291a7('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu
291b1('bum): rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra
291b2('bum): brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom
291b3('bum): sems su byed do/ / de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa
291b4('bum): rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po
291b5('bum): nyi shu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha
291b6('bum): dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad
291b7('bum): snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / che ba'i lha
292a1('bum): dang / gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la
292a2('bum): mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
292a3('bum): byin dang / mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs kyi sangs
292a4('bum): rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /
292a5('bum): de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge
292a6('bum): slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing
292a7('bum): yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ / nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid
292b1('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi sangs
292b2('bum): rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba
292b3('bum): dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa
292b4('bum): mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes
292b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab
292b6('bum): 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid
292b7('bum): zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes
293a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba
293a2('bum): sems la snang bar gyur to/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid
293a3('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi
293a4('bum): ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i
293a5('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong
293a6('bum): rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs
293a7('bum): su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na
293b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
293b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
293b3('bum): 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
293b4('bum): ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa bla na pa yang dag
293b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// gzugs
293b6('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro//
293b7('bum): gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// gzugs da ltar byung
294a1('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba
294a2('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba
294a3('bum): bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston
294a4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya
294a5('bum): bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du shes zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du shes bcings shes bya ba 'am grol
294a6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / 'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du shes ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du shes da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro//
294a7('bum): 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar chos ston par
294b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du byed bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par
294b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du byed ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa rtag ces

318a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur/ ston ni ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag
318a3('bum): pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du shes shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'du byed shin tu rnam par
318a4('bum): dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par
318a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rna ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// sna shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// lce shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
318a6('bum): chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / lus shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// yid shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes
318a7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / sgra shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// dri shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// ro shin tu rnam par
318b1('bum): dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / reg shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// chos shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//
318b2('bum): gi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa shin
318b3('bum): tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu
318b4('bum): rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// gi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos
318b5('bum): ston par 'gyur ro/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// lce'i
318b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam
318b7('bum): par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
319a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus
319a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// yid
319a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / sa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// chu'i khams shin tu

320b1('bum): spong ba rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes

320b7('bum): ston par 'gyur ro/ / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/
321a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//
321a2('bum): 'jigs pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po shin

321a7('bum): pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyer gnyis pa// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha tu pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/

323a1('bum): pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// skye ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rga shi yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi

323b3('bum): yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i
323b4('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
323b5('bum): phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
323b6('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
323b7('bum): pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// dbang po yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
324a1('bum): yongs su dag pa'o/ / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'phags
