334b3('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ro// lus ngan par 'gyur ro// rga pas 'khogs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bde ba
334b4('bum): spongs pas dus byed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs
334b5('bum): ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad dge dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang chung che dang / tshad
334b6('bum): che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / che ba dang gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang / 'og gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha tu
334b7('bum): phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang chos brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/
335a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
335a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
335a3('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba/ tshad pa grangs pa bsam gyis khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa dpag tu pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
335a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang /
335a5('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// rgyal
335a6('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// mtshe ma'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// dga' ldan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'phrul dga'i lha'i
335a7('bum): skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i skye
335b1('bum): ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / tshangs chen gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// chung snang gi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshad snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// kun snang
335b2('bum): dang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// chung dge'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshad dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// dge rgyas kyi lha'i skye pa'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//
335b3('bum): che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// chung che'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshad che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//
335b4('bum): gdung ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// gya nom snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'og gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
335b5('bum): kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// pa'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin
335b6('bum): pa'o/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid 'byin pa'o// rang byang chub 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
335b7('bum): 'byin pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
336a1('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//
336a2('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
336a3('bum): yod do/ / snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i
336a4('bum): lha rnams yod do/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i
336a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
336a6('bum): do/ / med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
336a7('bum): do/ / dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad pa bzhi yod do// gzugs med pa'i
336b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yod do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yod do// dbang po lnga yod do// stobs lnga yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yod do// 'phags
336b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa yod
336b3('bum): do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
336b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong
336b5('bum): pa nyid yod do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
336b6('bum): bzhi yod do/ / bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad pa bzhi yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam
336b7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo gsum yod do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad yod do// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod do// so so yang dag
337a1('bum): par rig pa bzhi yod do/ / byams pa chen po yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// thams cad shes pa nyid yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//
337a2('bum): de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing
337a3('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
337a4('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//
337a5('bum): tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
337a6('bum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod
337a7('bum): do/ / 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye
337b1('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong pa rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod
337b2('bum): do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// de bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs
337b3('bum): pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am dor ba do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am yongs su gzung ba 'am dor bar bya ba'i chos
337b4('bum): de lta bu do/ / rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am dge ba 'am 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pa pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang
337b5('bum): su do/ / rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni su do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'go ba do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos
337b6('bum): de lta bu su do/ rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes pa yang
337b7('bum): byed la de ltar rtog cing de ltar te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o//
338a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
338a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston
338a3('bum): pa 'am rnam par ston pa 'am yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am 'byin par byed pa 'am skye bar byed pa 'am 'gog par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par dag par byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am 'phel
338a4('bum): bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung bar byed pa do// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi
338a5('bum): khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam
338a6('bum): po nyi shu gsum pa/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma
338a7('bum): yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub
338b1('bum): pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
338b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
338b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
338b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
338b5('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/
338b6('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ dbang po rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa ma yin/
338b7('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshad pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
339a1('bum): rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
339a2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub
339a3('bum): pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ 'jigs pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ byams pa
339a4('bum): chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ snying rje chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong
339a5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub
339a6('bum): pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
339a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de
339b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par thugs su chud do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / ston to rjod do/ 'grel to/ rnam par 'byed do/
339b2('bum): gsal bar mdzad do/ yang dag par ston to// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldags kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ud+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mud dang / puN+da ri ka dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra
339b3('bum): ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ / kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar
339b4('bum): mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no//
339b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/
339b6('bum): 'khor bar bgyi pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
339b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // tshul
340a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid
340a2('bum): kyis stong ngo / / phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
340a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid
340a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
340a5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // pa stong pa nyid pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po pa stong pa nyid dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa
340a6('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo / / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis
340a7('bum): stong ngo / / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo // stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan
340b1('bum): lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo / / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo // tshad pa rnams tshad pa rnams kyis stong ngo // gzugs pa'i snyoms par
340b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo / / rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
340b3('bum): kyis stong ngo / / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pas stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting
340b4('bum): nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo / / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo // 'jigs pa rnams 'jigs pa
340b5('bum): rnams kyis stong ngo / / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo // byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ngo / snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs
340b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
340b7('bum): bus stong ngo / / dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
341a1('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin stong pa'o// de ni
341a2('bum): chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos
341a3('bum): gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor la chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am 'khor ba 'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gi chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am/ yongs su ma
341a4('bum): mthong ba ma mchis pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par
341a5('bum): ma grub pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor
341a6('bum): bar bgyid pa 'am 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang rab tu bstan pa dang bsgrags pa dang rab tu dgod pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang smos pa dang
341a7('bum): gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo // gang sus kyang ma bstan
341b1('bum): sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ / gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so//
341b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad do// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
341b3('bum): phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha tu
341b4('bum): phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
341b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thug pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
341b6('bum): stsal pa/ chos thams cad su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang
341b7('bum): lus pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
342a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa su pa'i
342a2('bum): phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
342a3('bum): su pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba pa'i phyir
342a4('bum): ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
342a5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
342a6('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang / 'gag pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
342a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa
342b1('bum): 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis
342b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
342b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
342b4('bum): pa/ lam mthong ba su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang sgrar brjod
342b5('bum): pa su pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ long gi bzhin su pa'i phyir ro//
342b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smyig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
342b7('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
343a1('bum): rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ma rig pa'i mun pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
343a2('bum): pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa
343a3('bum): 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa'i sems can pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
343a4('bum): su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
343a5('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
343a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
343a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
343b1('bum): pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
343b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
343b3('bum): pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma cing su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
343b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
343b5('bum): pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa'i
343b6('bum): mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog
343b7('bum): pa pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can pa'i phyir ro//
344a1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba pa'i phyir ro/
344a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
344a3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
344a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
344a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
344a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
344a7('bum): ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
344b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
344b2('bum): stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol bar sbyor ba pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
344b3('bum): cad la mngon par chags pa pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad su pa'i
344b4('bum): phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa pa'i phyir ro//
344b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
344b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
344b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa
345a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
345a2('bum): 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa
345a3('bum): nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
345a4('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
345a5('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
345a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
345a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
345b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
345b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
345b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
345b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
345b5('bum): stsal pa/ pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
345b6('bum): dngos po pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid
345b7('bum): kyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po pa'i
346a1('bum): ngo bo nyid su pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
346a2('bum): lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
346a3('bum): dge ba dang dge ba'i chos su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul
346a4('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi su pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga su pa'i phyir
346a5('bum): ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
346a6('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
346a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
346b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
346b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
346b3('bum): 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol
346b4('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha
346b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa bzhi'i pha
346b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i
346b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang ser sna su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
347a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ngan pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu
347a2('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
347a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
347a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
347a5('bum): shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs ma
347a6('bum): yin pa su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam ma yin pa su
347a7('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs chung ba su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
347b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa su pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
347b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
347b3('bum): 'di ni 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
347b4('bum): ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa pa dang / thogs pa pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
347b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
347b6('bum): phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
347b7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
348a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
348a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa
348a3('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la
348a4('bum): bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi/ rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni
348a5('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ / gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bzung ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klag pa dang kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du shes
348a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ 'jigs/ sngang / skrag par 'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
348a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas 'jigs sngang skrag par 'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
348b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so yongs su zhus so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas 'jigs sngang skrag par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang
348b2('bum): ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// brtson
348b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
348b4('bum): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang 'jigs sngang skrag par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du
348b5('bum): yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
348b6('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
348b7('bum): pa zab mo 'di thos kyang mos par bgyi bar nus so/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa de dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
349a1('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad
349a2('bum): du ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
349a3('bum): phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha tu
349a4('bum): phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ji
349a5('bum): ltar bsgom par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar
349a6('bum): bsgom par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan
349a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji
349b1('bum): ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dbang po rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ stobs
349b2('bum): rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams ni ji
349b3('bum): ltar bsgom par bgyi/ tshad pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyud ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
349b4('bum): ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/
349b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'jigs pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ sangs rgyas
349b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus yongs su ma dris so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol
349b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
350a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
350a2('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha
350a3('bum): ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
350a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
350a5('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad pa rnams dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
350a6('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de
350a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa
350b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
350b2('bum): shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
350b3('bum): phyag 'tshal ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do//
350b4('bum): kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
350b5('bum): mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo
350b6('bum): bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ / sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
350b7('bum): phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ / sems can rnams lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnams phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
351a1('bum): dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ / sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha
351a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ / sems can rnams rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnams bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
351a3('bum): la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ / sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par
351a4('bum): bya'o/ / khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// bdud pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//
351a5('bum): dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
351a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
351a7('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
351b1('bum): tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
351b2('bum): pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
351b3('bum): pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson
351b4('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
351b5('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi
351b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
351b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
352a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes
352a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
352a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab
352a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
352a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar
352a6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji
352a7('bum): ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
352b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab
352b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
352b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes
352b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
352b5('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes
352b6('bum): pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
352b7('bum): brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa bzhi
353a1('bum): la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen
353a2('bum): po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
353a3('bum): brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so
353a4('bum): legs so/ / kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis byung ngo // kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol
353a5('bum): tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la gnas te/ gang gi tshe
353a6('bum): gzugs la gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed do// tshor ba la gnas te/ gang gi tshe tshor ba la gnas pa de'i tshe/ tshor ba la brtson par byed do// 'du shes la gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'du shes la
353a7('bum): gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'du shes la brtson par byed do// 'du byed la gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'du byed la gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed la brtson par byed do// rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la

353b2('bum): par byed do/ / sna la gnas te/ gang gi tshe sna la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sna la brtson par byed do// lce la gnas te/ gang gi tshe lce la gnas pa de'i tshe/ lce la brtson par byed do// lus la gnas te/ gang gi tshe lus la

353b7('bum): rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ gang gi tshe sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sna'i rnam par shes pa
354a1('bum): la brtson par byed do/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ gang gi tshe lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas
354a2('bum): te/ gang gi tshe lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par
354a3('bum): shes pa la brtson par byed do/ / gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas te/ gang gi tshe gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ gi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas te/

354a6('bum): te reg pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do//

357a5('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la brtson par byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed do//

357b2('bum): pa de'i tshe/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
